dfischer.utils

Class SSLInit

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.SSLInit

  • public class SSLInit
extends java.lang.Object
    Initializes the library for encrypted network connections.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void enableECC()
      Add and enable the (optional) ECC provider.
      static void execute()
      Initializes the library for encrypted network connections (HTTPS - SSL/TLS) by configuring the IAIK security provider.
      static void execute(boolean enableDebugOutput)
      Initializes the library for encrypted network connections (HTTPS - SSL/TLS) by configuring the IAIK security provider at the first position.
      Note: Since Prx V5.2-H elliptic curves (ECC) are no longer enabled by default.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public static void execute(boolean enableDebugOutput)
        Initializes the library for encrypted network connections (HTTPS - SSL/TLS) by configuring the IAIK security provider at the first position.
        Note: Since Prx V5.2-H elliptic curves (ECC) are no longer enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        enableDebugOutput - if set to false debug output for adding new security providers is disabled. However errors are always written to stdout.
        See Also:
        enableECC(), isEnableECC()

      • execute

        public static void execute(boolean iaikFirst,
           boolean enableDebugOutput)
        Initializes the library for encrypted network connections (HTTPS - SSL/TLS) by configuring the IAIK security provider.
        Note: Since Prx V5.2-H elliptic curves (ECC) are no longer enabled by default.
        Parameters:
        iaikFirst - true = configure IAIK security provider at the first position (recommended), false = configure IAIK security provider at the last position (not recommended - may result in weak encryption keys)
        enableDebugOutput - if set to false debug output for adding new security providers is disabled. However errors are always written to stdout.
        Since:
        V5.4-L
        See Also:
        enableECC(), isEnableECC()

      • execute

        public static void execute()
        Initializes the library for encrypted network connections (HTTPS - SSL/TLS) by configuring the IAIK security provider. Debug output is enabled.
        Note: Since Prx V5.2-H elliptic curves (ECC) are no longer enabled by default.
        See Also:
        enableECC(), isEnableECC()

      • enableECC

        public static void enableECC()
        Add and enable the (optional) ECC provider.
        See Also:
        isEnableECC()

      • isEnableECC

        public static boolean isEnableECC()
        Get if the (optional) ECC provider is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the (optional) ECC provider is enabled.
        See Also:
        enableECC()

      • getNewSslSessionCache

        public static java.lang.Object getNewSslSessionCache(int sessionTimeout)
        Creates a new ssl session cache.
        Parameters:
        sessionTimeout - the session timeout in seconds of the cached ssl sessions.
        Hint: do not use smaller values than 300 seconds (5 minutes).
        Returns:
        a new ssl session cache, or null if sessionTimeout is 0 (zero).
